G

GameObject - Class in ie.atu.sw
This is the GameObject for entity's such as the Player or Spider, game engines such as Unity take a similar approach, with each GameObject in the game having a start and update method
GameObject(Position, String) - Constructor for class ie.atu.sw.GameObject
Construct a new GameObject, you need a Position and String location of sprites
GameObjectable - Interface in ie.atu.sw
Interface for a GameObject, implement the methods below, and you can be a GameObject too!
GameObjectStore - Class in ie.atu.sw
GameObjectStore is used to store the GameObject in the game.
GameView - Class in ie.atu.sw
Class that implements the game view for the game, handles key press events and game loop.
GameView(TileMatrix, TileMatrix) - Constructor for class ie.atu.sw.GameView
Construct a new GameView object, using ground and objects TileMatrix objects, loaded by Runner.
GameView.Builder - Class in ie.atu.sw
This class will help you building an instance of GameView.
